message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product.  Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $11,000.  What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
Hi Bob, thanks for your counter-offer. I understand your budget concerns, but $9,500 is a bit too low for me. Would you be willing to meet in the middle at $10,250?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but $10,250 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,800, but that's the highest I can go.
